description: Tools for compliance checking and policy validation

tools.name: get_markdown_policy_limits
tools.description: Retrieves the maximum allowed markdown percentage and any restrictions for different product categories or business units

product_category.description: Product category to check markdown limits for

business_unit.description: Business unit or department requesting the markdown

tools.name: validate_markdown_authorization
tools.description: Checks if the requested markdown percentage requires special authorization and identifies who can approve it

markdown_percentage.description: The markdown percentage to validate (e.g., 30 for 30%)

requester_role.description: Role or title of the person requesting the markdown

tools.name: check_markdown_compliance_rules
tools.description: Verifies if the markdown complies with company policies including seasonal restrictions, inventory thresholds, and margin requirements

markdown_percentage.description: The markdown percentage to check for compliance

current_inventory_level.description: Current inventory count for the product
